description: This file defines an API client for making HTTP requests to a backend service, including handling configurations, authorization headers, and response processing. It includes classes for exception handling and singleton instantiation of the API client.

classes.name: ApiException
classes.description: Custom exception class for API errors, including HTTP status code and message.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: Singleton class providing methods to perform HTTP operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) with automatic handling of headers, URL formation, and response processing.

methods.name: ApiClient.factory
methods.description: Factory constructor that returns the singleton instance.

methods.name: ApiClient.baseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for API requests, determined from environment variables or default.

methods.name: ApiClient._headers
methods.description: Asynchronously builds headers for HTTP requests, including authorization token if available.

methods.name: ApiClient._uri
methods.description: Constructs a Uri object from a given path and optional query parameters.

methods.name: ApiClient.get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified path with optional query parameters.

methods.name: ApiClient.post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request with a JSON-encoded body.

methods.name: ApiClient.put
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PUT request with a JSON-encoded body.

methods.name: _processResponse
methods.description: Handles processing of HTTP responses, decoding JSON or throwing exceptions on errors.
